document.full_text: syrian security forces killed at least three protesters in a damascus suburb on friday, witnesses said, as thousands turned out in pro-democracy marches despite a reform gesture by president bashar al-assad.
document.title: thousands call for freedom in syria, 3 killed in unrest
lines_and_colors: syrian security forces killed at least three protesters in a damascus suburb on friday, witnesses said, as thousands turned out in pro-democracy marches despite a reform gesture by president bashar al-assad.
